about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a dedicated English teacher with years of experience helping students achieve their language goals. I specialize in creating personalized learning programs that address your specific needs, whether for business, academics, or personal growth.

personalized.title: Personalized Approach
personalized.description: Every learning program is tailored to your specific needs, goals, and learning style.

flexible.title: Flexible Schedule
flexible.description: Choose lesson times that fit your busy schedule, with options for various time zones.

practical.title: Practical Focus
practical.description: Learn English that you'll actually use in real-life situations relevant to your goals.

progress.title: Measurable Progress
progress.description: Regular assessments and feedback to track your improvement and adjust as needed.

step1.title: Initial Assessment
step1.description: We begin with a comprehensive evaluation of your current English level, goals, and learning preferences.

step2.title: Custom Program Design
step2.description: I create a personalized learning program focused on your specific needs, whether for business, academics, or daily life.

step3.title: One-to-One Sessions
step3.description: Engage in focused, interactive lessons that provide immediate feedback and personalized attention.

step4.title: Continuous Adaptation
step4.description: Your program evolves as you progress, ensuring you're always challenged at the right level.

testimonial1.text: The personalized approach made all the difference in my language learning journey. I finally feel confident speaking English in business meetings.
testimonial1.author: Maria K., Marketing Professional

testimonial2.text: I needed English for my university studies abroad, and these lessons prepared me perfectly. The focus on academic vocabulary was exactly what I needed.
testimonial2.author: Alex T., Graduate Student

testimonial3.text: As someone who travels frequently, I wanted to improve my conversational English. The practical focus of our lessons has made a huge difference in my confidence.
testimonial3.author: David L., Business Traveler

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or submit information through this website.
privacyPolicy.informationCollectText: When you visit the website, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the website, we collect information about the individual web pages that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the website, and information about how you interact with the website.
privacyPolicy.personalInfoText: When you fill out the application form, we collect personal information that you provide, such as your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details. We also collect information about your English learning goals and experience.
privacyPolicy.useInfoText: We use the information we collect to communicate with you, process your application, and provide you with personalized English teaching services. We may also use this information to improve our website and services.
privacyPolicy.shareInfoText: We share your personal information only as necessary to provide our services, comply with applicable law, and protect our rights.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We will maintain your personal information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.
privacyPolicy.contactText: For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us.
